items.title: Bring career fairs and networking events to Downtown Campus.
items.details: I will push for on-campus career fairs and employer meetups so students donâ€™t have to travel to Burnaby. These events will provide opportunities for students to connect with industry professionals and learn about job openings.

items.title: Introduce BCIT Network Hub for structured speed-friending and networking.
items.details: This event will help students build friendships and professional connections in a relaxed environment. It will focus on connecting students across various disciplines and building a strong campus community.

items.title: Organize pre-exam wellness events featuring therapy dogs, meditation, and art therapy.
items.details: These wellness events will help reduce stress before exams and foster a supportive, positive environment on campus. Students can relax, meditate, and connect with therapy animals to improve their mental health.

items.title: Negotiate discounts for Downtown students with local businesses.
items.details: I will work with local businesses to provide discounts for students on essentials like food, fitness, and study-friendly spaces. This will help reduce financial stress, especially in the high-cost area of Downtown Vancouver.

items.title: Advocate for more visibility and financial support for student clubs.
items.details: Student clubs at Downtown campus need more recognition and resources. I will advocate for better funding and visibility for all clubs to foster engagement and enhance student life.
